alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Beaver and northwestern Iron Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 714 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 27 miles southwest of Milford to near Echo Canyon State Park. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Modena, Lund and Hamlin Valley. This includes Utah Route 56 between mile markers 3 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Salt Lake City.
